ygData.subject: Re: Playing Hide and Sneak
ygData.msgSnippet: Isn t it true that the most obvious answer is always the hardest to see. Works great now, thanks.  Man, i feel stupid... :)
ygData.messageBody:
Isn't it true that the most obvious answer is always the hardest to see.
Works great now, thanks. Man, i feel stupid... :)

Jesse wrote:

> From: Jesse <j@...>
>
> Make sure you're not playing a song. Playing a song, like casting a spell,
> prevents you from being able to hide or sneak. Since bards are almost
> always playing some song, you might not have noticed that little detail.
> ;)
>
> On Sat, 17 Jul 1999, Mr. Beeba wrote:
>
> > From: "Mr. Beeba" <flpmc@...>
> >
> > Ok heres my problem...2 months ago i hit the hide button and the thing
> > never recycled back through. Well, when i recieved the sneak skill two
> > lvls ago, i put 3 points into it hoping to try it out...nothing. The
> > hide skill is not allowing me to use it. So i thought maybe if i put
> > some more points into the sneak skill it would cycle the button through
> > faster. It didn't. So far i have put 8 skill points into sneak and
> > have not been able to use it once. Is this normal? or do you all think
> > that maybe mine is screwed up?
> >
> > Tadian of Veeshan
> >
> >
> > --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
> >
> > Why do WOMEN ASTRONAUTS have such BAD HAIRCUTS?
> > What happens if you CLEAN your self-cleaning OVEN?
